answers.answer: An Enlarged retroverted uterus could mean you have Adenomyosis.  Do you have Endometriosis as well? Or unless you meant enlarged Kidney. If so the retroverted uterus is of the norm for the most part.The fatty liver has to do with something completely different.What made you get the US to begin with? Pain, if so where?Have you had previous abdominal surgery, Do you drink? Are you overweight? do you have diabetes or have you been tested for diabetes recently?For the most part this US looks as though you should be seeing a doctor asap as the issues look to be your kidneys and Liver.

question: hi medhelp...can you explain the result of my ultrasound since i have no to go to the doctor at this time....impsresion says:FATTY LIVERPARAPELVIC CYST, RIGHT KIDNEYENLARGED RETROVERTED UTERUS WITH THICKENED ENDOMETRIUM THE LATTER POSSIBLY DUE TO SECRETORY CHANGEThank you
title: please help me to read my ultrasound result
